https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4w0anbwOooDbG936vpZGhCbU28m.jpg The slightly chubby harness racer Bjarte doesn't get the good horses anymore, and is forced to enter the criminal path in order to keep menacing creditors at bay. A fatal choice of partners ends up in a failed doping attempt, and a consequent kidnapping of the top horse Berlusconi. Chasing Berlusconi
